ygData.subject: loss of lupine dagger...
ygData.msgSnippet: hi guys and gals... this is eliza,  hope u guys are doing good!!  anyways, i logged in a couple of days ago and found my lupine dagger missing...=(..havent
ygData.messageBody:
hi guys and gals...

this is eliza, hope u guys are doing good!! anyways, i logged in a couple
of days ago and found my lupine dagger missing...=(..havent been playing for
2 months so havent really touched my eq account for that period....was
wondering whether there were any patches or any bug that might have caused
the disappearance of my dagger.....kinda weird that it just disappeared
without any reason....

if any of u guys has experienced something similar to this, hope u can get
back to me...

eliza
ranger 51
erollisi marr
